short_summary: Air handling unit renovations for the department of public work
description: The procurement is for the supply of an air handling unit.
tags: Heating and ventilation and air circulation
full_summary:
### Air Handling Unit

#### Tender Reference Information

*   **Tender Reference Number**: WS3717264291-Doc3836615425
*   **Amendment Number**: 5
*   **Publication Date**: 2023-02-07
*   **Tender Closing Date**: 2023-04-25T14:00:00 (EDT)
*   **Expected Contract Start Date**: 2022-12-31
*   **Expected Contract End Date**: Not Specified

#### Tender Status and Category

*   **Tender Status**: Expiré (Expired)
*   **Procurement Category**: GD
*   **Notice Type**: Demande de propositions (Request for Proposal)
*   **Procurement Method**: Concurrentielle - Invitation ouverte à soumissionner (Competitive - Open bidding)
*   **Selection Criteria**: Prix le plus bas (Lowest Price)

#### Trade Agreements

This tender is open to bidders who have entered into agreements with the Government of Canada under the following trade agreements:

*   Accords de libre-échange Canada-Chili (Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA))
*   Accord de libre-échange canadien (Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA))
*   Accord de libre-échange Canada-Corée (Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA))
*   Accord de libre-échange Canada-Colombie (Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement)
*   Accord de libre-échange Canada-Honduras (Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement)
*   Accord de libre-échange Canada-Panama (Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement)

#### Contact Information and Notice URL

*   **Contracting Entity**: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
*   **Contact Information**: Murray, David (SPAC/PSPC)
*   **Contact Email**:  david.murray@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
*   **Notice URL**: http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/15344430?extsite=MTUzNDQ0MzBfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==

#### Tender Description and Requirements

The Department of Environment and Climate Change Canada (ECCC) requires a new rooftop air handling unit. All bids must be submitted on 2023-04-25 at 14:00 EDT. Delivery of the unit is desired by 29
